quotes.quote: Man is not committed in detail by his biological constitution to any particular variety of behavior.
There is hardly a mistake which in the course of our lives we have committed, but some proverb, had we known and attended to its lesson, might have saved us from it.
It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.

We must be fully committed, but we must also be aware at the same time that we might possibly be wrong. People who claim to be absolutely convinced that their stand is the only right one... is a dead giveaway of unconscious doubt. Commitment is healthiest when it is not without doubt, but in spite of doubt.
He who truly believes that which prompts him to an action has looked upon the action to lust after it, he has committed it already in his heart.
You have to be committed or you fall behind, lose out.

Commitment to an idea that has the power to transform you personally in any way is a vision worth nurturing. The bottom line is,you need to remain committed to a vision long enough to see it vome to fruition.
If you love something and if you're committed and diligent â€“ the things happen!
More faults are often committed while we are trying to oblige than while we are giving offense.
The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
To reach levels of success you've never reached before, you must be committed at a level you've never been committed at before.

After a while, if you're committed, you start to believe in the things in which you're praying. It's just cognitive dissonance. You can't live a completely religious life and not start to have it sink in.
Success in business isn't about being right; it's about being committed.
Your man wants to know that there's nothing you wouldn't do for him - if that's your committed relationship.
It's hard to stay committed when our heart isn't in it.
Stay committed in your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
We are not committed to this or that. We are committed to the nothing in-between, whether we know it or not.
The moment that you impose your will on another person or animal, that's when we are allowed to say you have committed an ethical breach.

You can be committed to somebody because of ego: 'I said I was going to be with this joker for the rest of my life, so I'm just going to do it.' Or you can be committed because you have a deeply rooted connection.
When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results.
You are committed to what you confess.
One can be committed to conformity or one can be committed to truth, but not both.
A leader's job is to develop committed followers. Bad leaders destroy their followers' sense of commitment.
There's always a way - if you're committed.
People don't really know whether they are committed to something until they face adversity.
To act is to be committed, and to be committed is to be in danger.
Many great actions are committed in small struggles.
When you are fundamentally committed to something that is right, you just decide to go down fighting. Period.
Success tends to bless those who are most committed to giving it the most attention.
Anyone can quit, but it takes a strong, committed person not to quit when times are tough.
You have to be very committed and find happiness in the work that you do.
Many who are committed to reason and science have turned against religion altogether and treat it with fear and contempt.
The way you can recognize to what you are committed to is by your actual results. What you have gotten in life is a direct result (good or bad) to what you have been committed to.
If you're in a committed relationship, then you don't want to pursue anything.
Little movements of communities of ordinary radicals are committed to doing small things with great love.
